summary: Completed comprehensive testing of School Administration SaaS app. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has critical Select component bugs preventing proper form interactions.

ui_bugs.issue: React Select.Item components missing value prop - causing runtime errors and preventing dropdown selections
ui_bugs.error_message: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string

ui_bugs.issue: Users getting logged out when navigating between pages
ui_bugs.symptoms: JWT token not persisting across page navigation

integration_issues.issue: Frontend using incorrect API format - fixed during testing
integration_issues.fix_applied: Updated RegisterPage.js to use correct nested object structure

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (major UI component issues preventing full testing)

critical_fixes_required: Fix Select component value prop issue across all forms - this is blocking all dropdown interactions
Fix authentication token persistence issue causing users to be logged out
Test and verify all Select components in Admission, Fee Management, Attendance, and Notification forms
action_item_for_main_agent.priority: CRITICAL - App is partially functional but core form interactions are broken
